name: The Tree, The Apple, The Shepherd, And The Fallen
name_original: The Tree, The Apple, The Shepherd, And The Fallen
description:
Born from the Grissyl Tree, a child enters a strange world... A prequel to The Giant, The Sword, The Town, and The Traveller.

Features

  • Fully voice-acted ensemble.
  • Stunningly handcrafted environments and characters.
  • A large helping of beautiful music and cinematics.
  • 15-20 minutes of playtime.
  • Made in just a month!
